name: ball
longDescription: It's a small white ping-pong ball, much like the ones they make on Earth.
pickupMessage: For some reason you put the ping-pong ball in your mouth.
dropMessage: The ball bounces and rolls away before stopping.

name: pencil
longDescription: This pencil is yellow, and sharpened. It's a #3 pencil, which makes it one better than your average pencil.
pickupMessage: You grab the pencil and tuck it behind one ear like a science professor.

name: gum
longDescription: The gum is a small wad of pink goo. It looks like it has already been chewed, but not by you.

name: library
longDescription: The javascript library resembles a carved wooden box.

name: raft
longDescription: The raft is made of rubber and full of air.
pickupMessage: You sling the raft over your shoulder and onto your back.

use.useMessage: You throw the raft into the river and then hop in, paddling furiously with your hands. After a few frantic minutes, you reach the far side of the river and hop out of the raft.

name: glass
longDescription: The spooky glass is small, and oblong.
pickupMessage: You pick it up, with hesitation, because it's extra spooky.

use.useMessage: You hold the spooky glass up, and through it you can see that the cyrillic message on the wall says: Russian Warship, go fuck yourself!

name: marble
longDescription: The marble is like a mirror, looking deep into your soul. It reminds you of a spinning disco ball.
pickupMessage: You pick it up, and it regards you with suspicion.

use.useMessage: You hold the marble up and suddenly you hear keyboards in the distance. The Bee-Gees poster on the wall seems to suddenly come to life.

name: barrel
longDescription: The barrel looks sturdy and just big enough for an idiot to get into.
pickupMessage: You pick it up, and sling it over your back. It's heavy and you aren't sure how far you can carry it.

use.useMessage: You climb into the barrel, like an idiot, and roll into the river just above the waterfall. The strong current carries you over the falls.

name: dove
longDescription: The dove reminds you of snow and birds.
pickupMessage: You gently pick up the dove, which doesn't try to fly away. In a tiny bird voice it says, Stephen King is my spirit animal.

use.useMessage: You release the dove and it spirals toward the sun, looking down at you one last time. A guitar appears at your feet.

name: guitar
longDescription: The guitar is purple and looks ancient and worn, but still functional.
pickupMessage: You pick up the guitar and strum an E Minor chord--as people do.

use.useMessage: You start playing Stairway to Heaven. A Gnome shows up and slaps you.

name: key
longDescription: The key is ornate and made out of gold. It has a ruby jewel on the handle.

use.useMessage: You put the key in the door lock and turn it. A box of sand drops out of the sky, but the door does not open.

name: cable
longDescription: The HDMI cable is black and three meters long.
pickupMessage: You pick up the cable and wrap it around your waist like a belt.

use.useMessage: You plug one end of the cable into the trashcan, and the other end into the rectangular screen on the wall. There's a flicker and then the image resolves into a line of text that reads, GUESS MY WORD! IT'S 6 CHARACTERS LONG! FOR EACH LETTER YOU GET RIGHT, I WILL PRINT A 'C' UNLESS IT'S IN THE WRONG SPOT. THOSE WILL GET A 'W'. LETTERS THAT AREN'T EVEN IN MY WORD GET AN 'X'. You only have 6 guesses before you lose your marble.

name: sand
longDescription: The box of sand weighs a few pounds. On the side of the box it says 'Sand?'
pickupMessage: You pick up sand, which is in a box.

use.useMessage: You pour the sand into the node farm and the nodes begin singing a happy song. A flare gun appears in mid-air and then lands softly at your feet.

name: gun
longDescription: The flare gun is metallic, with one barrel and one trigger. It looks like a flare is loaded into the chamber.
pickupMessage: You pick up flare gun and make sure the safety is flipped on, then you tuck it into your left front pocket where it's likely to shoot off your wang--if you have a wang. If not... congratulations!

use.useMessage: You fire the flare gun into the air. The helicopter stops circling and gets closer. Just as you think it's going to land, the pilot throws a black cable out of the window and then heads back skyward.

name: snake
longDescription: The snake is a Nazi, which you can tell from the look in it's eyes--and the red MAGA hat.
pickupMessage: Why would you do that? It bites you on the arm and you drop it.

name: booster
longDescription: The booster looks like a chocolate donut, but you know it must have an embedded tracking device.
pickupMessage: You shove the whole thing in your mouth at once, like an animal. Your skin tingles and the back of your neck goes cold.

name: bucket
longDescription: The bucket is full of acid and smells like a bad idea.
pickupMessage: You are a little clumsy and the acid spills all over your face. You drop the bucket and scream a little.
